customJQL.My Issues: project = ASGARD AND assignee = currentUser() ORDER BY updated DESC
customJQL.Open Tasks: project = ASGARD AND status != Done ORDER BY priority DESC
customJQL.Sprint Backlog: project = ASGARD AND sprint in openSprints()
customJQL.High Priority: project = ASGARD AND priority in (Highest, High) ORDER BY created DESC
customJQL.Public Tasks: project = ASGARD AND labels = public ORDER BY priority DESC
customJQL.Developer Tasks: project = ASGARD AND labels in (developer, frontend, backend, api) ORDER BY priority DESC
